name: Old Discord Colors [V1.0.1]
description: Don't like the colors of the Discord redesign? Then you're in luck! This style changes those green buttons and dark search bars back to the old colors.

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.0.1
A lot of the new darker backgrounds are now lighter again.

Version 1.0
Fixed an issue where avatars were wierd.
Old channel icon removed.
Changed style name to Old Discord Colors, because I'm not planning on updating this style anymore with old UI elements.
Changed description.
Member and Ban list search bars are now the old color.
The Add Friend button is now the old color.
Changed style image.

Version 0.1.1
Fixed style name.
Fixed version number.
Added image to style.

Version 0.1
Initial release.
